title: Report a Minor Safety Incident
description: A worker reports a near-miss incident where a container was nearly dropped. A safety officer must log the incident.

tasks.description: Gather details of the incident: time, location, equipment involved, and a description of what happened.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer collects all relevant facts about the near-miss.

tasks.description: Create a new incident report in the safety management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new report is created with all the gathered details, classified as 'Near-Miss'.

tasks.description: Assign an action item to the terminal manager to conduct a toolbox talk on safe lifting procedures with crane operators.
tasks.expected_outcome: A corrective action is assigned to the relevant manager to prevent recurrence.
